properties.description: The first known fatal US drone strike inside Pakistan. The strike was carried out with prior ISI approval, according to ‘a senior CIA official who served in the region’.[1]  Pakistan’s Army initially claimed the attack as its own work.  ‘In a secret deal, the CIA had agreed to kill him in exchange for access to airspace.[2]
properties.source: Source: The Bureau of Investigative Journalism

properties.description: A failed strike against Abu Hamza Rabia(‘al Qaeda’s Number 3’). Once again the Pakistan Army initially claimed responsibility for the attack, blaming it on a blast caused whilst militants prepared bombs.[1] This attack was carried out with prior approval from the ISI.[2]
properties.source: Source: The Bureau of Investigative Journalism
